Player History
Injured on 6/27/1969 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Drafted in 5th round, 99th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1976...
Injured on 4/6/1982 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...

Released by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1984...
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Boston in 1985...
Injured on 5/21/1987 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
